EmailTemplate.subject: Reminder: Pivotal Atlanta Grand Opening Event Tuesday, March 21, 2017
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hello {{lead.First Name:default=there}},
Thank you for registering for the Pivotal Atlanta Grand Opening Event.
Date: Tuesday, March 21, 2017
Time:
Grand Opening Reception 6:30PM to 9:30PM
Location: Pivotal Atlanta Office 675 Ponce de Leon Ave NE, Suite 7500 Atlanta, GA 30308 (map <[[https://www.google.com/maps/place/Ponce+City+Market,+675+Ponce+De+Leon+Ave+NE,+Atlanta,+GA+30308/data=!4m2!3m1!1s0x88f50410912c7be9:0x275114353ab5ce34?sa=X&ved=0ahUKEwjihMixwoPSAhWowlQKHY0MCAMQ8gEIGTAA]]>)
We look forward to seeing you there.
Parking - We encourage you to utilize public transportation or ride sharing, however parking is available on site. The closest parking lot is located on the west side of Ponce City Market near West Elm. Enter Ponce City Market through the door closest to West Elm. The elevators are on your immediate left, across from West Elm and the staircase. We are located on the 7th floor.
Should you have any questions or would like more information about this event, please email Peter Schmitt at pschmitt@pivotal.io <[[mailto:pschmitt@pivotal.io]]>.
Sincerely, The Pivotal Team
